name: ai-mobile-assistant
description: AI-powered mobile assistant for field agents with offline capabilities

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mobile && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf dist node_modules && npm install
